H0.text: Which football team plays its home games at Portman Road. Ipswich Town FC

H1.text: Which football team plays its home games at Portman Road. Norwich City FC

H2.text: Which football team plays its home games at Portman Road. Colchester United

H3.text: Which football team plays its home games at Portman Road. ITFC

A4.text: Ipswich Town have played their home games at Portman Road since 1884.

A5.text: The team play their home games at Colchester Community Stadium in Colchester, the home of Colchester United, as well as playing the occasional game at Portman Road.
